# GRB 240411B: GMG optical observation
``` R.-Z. Li, B.-T. Wang, J. Mao, and J.-M. Bai (YNAO, CAS) report:
We observed the field of GRB 240411B (Li et al., GCN 36063, T0 at 15:32:54 UT) using the GMG-2.4m telescope at the Lijiang Observatory. The observation began at 2024-04-11T21:55:31, approximately 6.4 hours after the trigger.
The optical counterpart of GRB 240411B, not visible in the Pan-STARRS1 r-band image, was (marginally/clearly) detected at the coordinates (J2000): RA = 15h 26m 10.15s DEC = -02d 08' 47.0" , with a positional uncertainty of 0.5" or better.
The preliminary analysis results are shown as follows: -------------------------------------------------- Tmid-T0 [s] filter mag 5-sigma UL -------------------------------------------------- 23257 ± 300 R 21.16 ± 0.15 22.64 -------------------------------------------------- The given magnitudes are derived based on calibration against Pan-STARRS1 field stars and are not corrected for the expected Galactic foreground extinction, corresponding to a reddening of E(B-V) = 0.138 mag in the direction of the optical counterpart (Schlafly & Finkbeiner 2011).
We acknowledge the staff at the Lijiang Observatory for conducting the observation. ```
# GRB 240411B: GMG optical upper limit ``` R.-Z. Li, B.-T. Wang, J. Mao, and J.-M. Bai (YNAO, CAS) report:
We observed the field of GRB 240411B (Li et al., GCN 36063, T0 at 15:32:54 UT) using the GMG-2.4m telescope at the Lijiang Observatory. The observation began at 2024-04-11T21:55:31, approximately 6.4 hours after the trigger.
No any optical counterpart of GRB 240411B was detected within the XRT/EP-WXT/EP-FXT/VT error circle (GCN XXX).
The preliminary analysis results are shown as follows: ---------------------------------- Tmid-T0 [s] filter 5-sigma UL ---------------------------------- 23257 ± 300 R 22.64 ---------------------------------- The given magnitudes are derived based on calibrating against Pan-STARRS1 field stars.
We acknowledge the staff at the Lijiang Observatory for conducting the observation. ```

# 前期准备 ## 创建GPG公钥和私钥 ```bash gpg --full-generate-key --expert # 记住私钥的密码 ``` ![image](https://github.com/Astro-Lee/astro-lee.github.io/assets/61745903/a9ba85af-5f40-41c8-b814-a96de04927aa)
```bash gpg --armor --export GPG密钥ID ``` 复制以 `-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----` 开头并以 `-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----` 结尾的 GPG 密钥。
